summary:
This is a simple retexture of the ebony mail for male and female!

You find, the ebony mail is too bright? This mod will fix it!!! ;)
descriptionHtml:
Hey,

this is my first retexture-mod. I made the ebony mail a little bit darker, so that the result (in combination with the nightingale hood) is breathtaking!

So I hope you enjoy it. (:

(if you have an idea for a better retexture, just let me know with a message ;D)

_________________________________________________________________________________________

installation:

very simple - extract the textures folder into the Data folder in the Skyrim Installation directory.

_________________________________________________________________________________________

Best wishes, 

your P.M. aka MeisterDerSchatten
author: MeisterDerSchatten
